mapper.insert: insert into reservation( user_id, reserve_date, amount, product_id, msg, tel, purchase_id, first_contact_id, constant, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values( #{userId}, #{reserve_date}, #{amount}, #{product.id}, #{msg}, #{tel}, #{purchase.id}, #{contact.id}, #{constant}, 0, SYSDATE(), 0, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: select reservation.id id, reservation.user_id user_id, reservation.reserve_date reserve_date, reservation.amount amount, product.id product, product.name name, product.pay_type payType, product.term term, reservation.tel tel, reservation.msg msg, reservation.create_user createUser, reservation.create_time createTime, reservation.update_user updateUser, reservation.update_time updateTime from reservation,product where reservation.product_id = product.id

select reservation.id id, reservation.user_id user_id, reservation.reserve_date reserve_date, reservation.amount amount, product.id product, product.name name, product.pay_type payType, product.term term, reservation.tel tel, reservation.msg msg, reservation.create_user createUser, reservation.create_time createTime, reservation.update_user updateUser, reservation.update_time updateTime from reservation,product where reservation.product_id = product.id and user_id = #{userId}

select reservation.id id, reservation.user_id user_id, reservation.reserve_date reserve_date, reservation.amount amount, product.id product_id, product.name name, product.pay_type pay_type, product.value_date value_date, product.due_date due_date, product.profit_id profit_id, product.pay_type_info pay_type_info, product.term term, reservation.tel tel, reservation.msg msg, reservation.create_user createUser, reservation.create_time createTime, reservation.update_user updateUser, reservation.update_time updateTime from reservation,product where reservation.product_id = product.id and user_id = #{userId} and reservation.id = #{id}

select a.id as a_id, a.user_id as a_user_id, a.reserve_date as a_reserve_date, a.product_id as a_product_id, a.amount as a_amount, a.tel as a_tel, a.msg as a_msg, a.purchase_id as a_purchase_id, a.first_contact_id as a_first_contact_id, a.constant as a_constant, a.create_user as a_create_user, a.create_time as a_create_time, a.update_user as a_update_user, a.update_time as a_update_time, b.id as b_id, b.name as b_name, b.user_name as b_user_name, c.id as c_id, c.name as c_name, c.code as c_code, d.id as d_id, d.contact_id as d_contact_id, d.record as d_record, d.last_contact_id as d_last_contact_id, e.id as e_id, e.record as e_record
from reservation a inner join user b on a.user_id = b. id inner join product c on a.product_id = c.id left join contact_record d on a.first_contact_id = d.id and d.contact_id = -1 left join contact_record e on d.last_contact_id = e.id order by a.create_time desc
mapper.update: update reservation set first_contact_id = #{firstContactId} where id=#{appointmentId}
update reservation set constant = #{Constant} where id = #{reservationId}
update reservation set purchase_id = #{purchaseId} where id= #{reservationId}
